p: For virus infection, BMDMs were infected with ZIKV at 1 MOI with or without ZY13 and Amodiaquine (AQ, A2799, Sigma, Burlington, MA, United States) administration. AQ is an FDA-approved drug and can effectively inhibit ZIKV infection in neural progenitor cells both in vitro and in a mouse model ( Zhou et al., 2017). Twenty four hours post infection, cells were lysed in TRIzol reagent for RNA isolation and further analysis.
